About Me.description: My name is Joel Miles. I was born in the UK, but I have lived in Canada and the US in recent years (I am a permanent resident in the US). I am currently a full-time teacher in Surrey, Canada. I have a passion for science and technology, and I am looking to develop software as a career.

I began programming in high school using Visual Basics. My first program was a WinForms style app that pulled information from a Facebook video game. Since then, I have been hobby coding in C# (mostly backend). Recently, I have been learning JavaScript and React. Areas I have dabbled in:
  • Selenium web scrapping
  • HTML, CSS, JS, React
  • ASP.NET Web API
  • AWS Lambda, S3, EC2
